name: Tower of Steel
description:
** Summary **

You play as an adventurer trying to scale the highest tower. Dig through 500m mass of steel and metal blocks blocking your way and rack up points, but make sure you have a  path ready...

** Controls **

-A/D to move left and right

-W/Space to jump

-Up/Down/Left/Right to attack Up/Down/Left/Right

Made for the "Broken Steel" GDWC-Jam
